FuncDef: The display fr pvc-info command displays PVC configurations and statistics.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type and number of an interface.
Currently, only POS interfaces are supported, excluding sub-interfaces.

Specifies a DLCI.
The value is an integer ranging from 16 to 1007.

Examples: PVC statistics for interface Pos1/0/0 (DTE, physical UP)
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If a PVC has been configured, run the display fr pvc-info command to check PVC configurations and statistics.
If no parameter is specified, the PVC configurations and statistics on all interfaces are displayed.If only interface is specified, the PVC configurations and statistics on the specified interface are displayed.If both interface and dlci are specified, the PVC configurations and statistics of the specified DLCI on the specified interface are displayed.

Prerequisites
The FR interface and DLCI have been configured.
